## Survey Design



---

<!-- solution-begin  -->

- Idea is to capture _changes in competence_ (e.g., changes in what students know and are able to do), which is based on research from @hiebert2014power
- The survey instrument is designed using approaches outlined by @kanevsky2014post
- Relying on 5E Model Approach [@elby2010epistemological] to achieve change
